title: Group
description: A group of the material in notes website.

$schema.description: The schema used by this object.

label.description: The label of the group, shown in the top menu of the website.

title.description: The title of the group, shown in the group page.

description.description: The description of this material group.

noIndex.description: A value indicating whether the group should appear in the top menu of the website or not.

noSection.description: A value indicating whether the group should contains it's own pages that aren't put in sections.
